parameters.name: Ex_2_0_y1x0_e_Ex_u_IP0
parameters.comment: zeroth order interpolation of the very first element on x0

parameters.name: Ex_2_0_y0x0_e_Ex_d_IP0
parameters.comment: zeroth order interpolation of the very first element on x0

parameters.name: Ex_2_1_y1x1_e_Ex_u_IP0
parameters.comment: zeroth order interpolation of the last element at x1

parameters.name: Ex_2_1_y0x1_e_Ex_d_IP0

grid_f.comment: front grid at x = x1, the back grid (grid_b) is at x = x0

grid_b.comment: front grid at x = x1, the back grid (grid_b) is at x = x0
